title: bookmarks thumbnails
content:
Hello, what's wrong with the bookmarks thumbnails, that they don't display properly (not as the site's logo), only some default ones that look ugly. Only some tabs have thumbnails. I have freshly installed firefox on a new PC and I've been using it for another day and nothing changes, I visit these websites constantly and these icons still look like this. It will stay like this or is it some browser error ?

Greetings

Tom
creator: bruno.funkyzeit

title: New translator feature
content: Your new translation feature is great, by any chance do you have simplified Chinese or will that be coming in the future?
creator: richs

title: Upon update to v118 lost all Bookmarks, no restore
content:
upgraded to v118 9'30 Bookmarks lost and not able to access old profile, or restore using "Manage Bookmarks"

See attached: Only see one real profile (current, new) in App Support > Firefox > Profiles. The second profile that exists has virtually nothing in it compared to the new one created upon upgrade. Only three tiny files key4,cert9,pkcs11. Nothing else to restore from.

Bookmark manager >> restore >> despite seeing 10 dates to chose form , error messages every time, "unable to process the backup file." Now what?

I do see a "places.sqlite" file which seems to show "last modified" date of prior to my unfortunate update. But when I try to have Firefox open it, nothing happens. Just new browser windows every time.

THX in advance.
creator: srih4

title: Extension syncing
content: Is there any plan to be able to sync what extensions are being used and their current settings between desktop and mobile?
creator: Thomas.kitchens

title: Missing Profile, settings and data - extentions, bookmarks, passwords etc
content: Due to a Windows 11 system restore, I had to reinstall Firefox. After signing in I found that all bookmarks, extensions and passwords have gone and the original 2020 profile they were attached to seems to be missing as well. I initially installed the Firefox app from the windows store and thought that might have been the problem, so uninstalled it and reinstalled from the mozilla website. That didn't heelp so I went through all the help articles I could find and I still can't figure out how to restore anything.
creator: plantshateme

title: Kaspersky Password manager does not work anymore with Firefox.
content: I have used Firefox for years and also use Kaspersky as my security along with Kaspersky's password manager. Recently, after a Firefox upgrade, while using Firefox to access websites using passwords it will not auto fill from Kaspersky. I have the extension installed. Kaspersky works on all other browsers.
creator: gwwebb30

title: Lag, replay
content: When I am streaming TV shows or movies online using Firefox the timer in bottom left corner is is not going up by one. It seems that since the net framework updates in the past 3 days have updated in Firefox which is now causing my computer to act like a virus. The show will glitch and repeat 2 to 5 seconds worth of time. Seems you all need to check your crap with Microsoft to update your Firefox.
creator: blairhanna.2230

title: You tube video problems
content: For some time now I have been having trouble with viewing you tube video's. At times the video freezes or just sort of locks up. But, I don't have the same problem with other browsers, Chrome, Brave. So, it just seems with Firefox this issue pertains. Can some one please help so I don't experience the Firefox you tube problems. Thank you.
creator: sciencemagic
